main event: A 12-year-old youth observed two unidentified objects in Hadley, Massachusetts, with blinking red and blue lights over a span of three minutes.
interesting points: The observer noted that when the red light went out, the blue light remained steady., The sighting occurred twice, with the object disappearing behind trees before reappearing., The observer was convinced it was not a plane, jet, or helicopter., The object had a slight hum and appeared to move at a terrific speed., The youth had seen similar unidentified objects in the past.
sighted object: two unidentified flying objects with blinking lights
witness description: a 12-year-old youth who had previously observed UFOs
